param.name: id
param.label: Location ID
param.description: The ID# location you want to display

param.name: showmaponitempage
param.label: Show map on item page?
param.description: Shows a small map with the marker on the item page.

param.name: item_gmap_default_zoom
param.label: Item Page Map Zoom
param.description: Default Zoom of the map on the item page

param.name: item_gmap_width
param.label: Item Page Map Width
param.description: Map width in pixels of the map displayed on the individual location's page (E.g: 500).

param.name: item_gmap_height
param.label: Item Page Map Height
param.description: Map height in pixels of the map displayed on the individual location's page (E.g: 500).

param.name: domhook
param.label: DOM Load Event?
param.description: ADVANCED ONLY: This allows you to switch between the various page load events that we use to initialize the Google Map. Try different settings here if your map does not display.
